attributes.additional_details: If an Mp refuses a drug test he should then be kicked out of Parliament with no pay off or future pension as this would be admitting guilt.
attributes.background: MPs like all other jobs should be drug tested regular as the job they do is important and if there on drugs then could make a wrong decision.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264011
